Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Not only leaders gop to the Matrix, the Matrix was made so that one day the 
hopes and dreams of all those who died for freedom and peace with the 
autobots and decepticons would one day make those dreams a reality by 
lighting the darkest our of their descendants. The Matrix in G1 was the 
actual matrix and ignoring that is ignoring full dead on Canon. Just because 
the matrix was destroyed in G1 does not mean the dimension known as "The 
Matrix" Where the souls of the dead and heroic autobots and decepticons is 
gone. The Matrix in G1 was designed to tap into the power of those sparks, 
not destroy them. Remember the phrase they said "Till all are one" Which 
means one singular entity which could eb considered the matrix. Besides the 
Matrix device in G1 was duplicagted to an extent but not to its full power. 
Such as the Matrix Devices that were held by Lio Convoy, Big Convoy, and 
Super Fire Convoy. And the upcoming OPtimus Prime of the new TF Series, 
Transformers: Armada(Btw, who he doesn't think that Demolisher looks like the 
bastard son of Metroplex and Trypticon?). Anyway there is some clarrifying 
Info.

--part1_14f.fa19cc9.2a436e6b_boundary
